startServer

public void startServer(TeddyServer server)
Start the SpiderMonkey server. If the server is already running, just return.

Parameters:
server - The TeddyServer instance. Necessary to set a ConnectionListener that is informed of all connection-related stuff.
See Also:
ConnectionListener

Get the public key from the server for encryption reasons.

Specified by:
getPubKey in interface NetworkCommunicatorAPI
Parameters:
